title: Didn't get my allstar icon
body: I have already submitted my votes but I didn't get my icon yet. I also checked shop where there is no icon either.

replies.body: Hey Daisy, icons are being granted at the end of each day (we got a looooot of votes coming in). I see that this post of 2 days old, so you should have it in your icon inventory by now. If you don't, let me know and I'll figure out what went wrong!

if the vote are handle at the end of each day, the first day of vote was probably bugged.
I submit mine the first day and still wait for the icon (you can check atm if you want, I just log in to be sure^^)
i didnt get it either.. smh riot
